sourcesContent:
let num=0

const increaseReducer=(state=num,action)=>{
        switch(action.type){
            case "INCREASE_NUM":
                    return state+action.paylond
            case "MULTIPLY_NUM":
                    return state*action.paylond
            case "DECREASE_NUM":
                    return state-action.paylond    
            case "DIVIDE_NUM":
                    return state/action.paylond
                    default:
                   return state
        }
}

export default increaseReducer
